CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y         libfreetype6-dev         libjpeg62-turbo-dev         libmcrypt-dev         libpng-dev     && docker-php-ext-install iconv mcrypt pdo_mysql mbstring     && docker-php-ext-configure gd --with-freetype-dir=/usr/include/ --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/include/     && docker-php-ext-install gd
